caption:
“Every tear is a prism for grace.”

Reflection:
Sorrow refracts the light of love. Through pain, mercy shines in new colors.

Commentary:
This reflection teaches that grief is not absence of God but an encounter with His gentleness. Grace bends through tears to reveal beauty.
